item.description:
Nurse's Hall, Massachusetts State House, 24 Beacon St., Boston 02133

Sponsored by the Liberty Preservation Association of Massachusetts
http://www.masslpa.or...
http://www.facebook.c...

Program / Invited Speakers List
(all speakers not confirmed, subject to change)

Introduction, Tricorn Tom Moor, emcee http://www.themidnigh...
Invocation - Patriot Pastor Garrett Lear http://www.thepatriot...
Pledge of Allegiance - led by Sean Harrington, Arlington High School
Singing of the National Anthem - led by Brad Marston, candidate for State Rep. 8th Suffolk http://bradmarston.ni...
Bob Dwyer - President MassLPA www.masslpa.org
Ken Mandile - organizer for Worcester Tea Party http://www.worcestert...
Hal Shurtleff, N.E. region rep.-JBS, intro of John McManus
John McManus, Pres. of JBS, keynote speaker http://www.jbs.org/jo...
Dan McGonigle, state organizer-Committees of Safety, intro of Bob Hedlund http://www.committees...
State Senator Bob Hedlund, Minority Whip http://www.bobhedlund...
N.H. State Rep. Dan Itse -- sponsor HCR6 http://en.wikipedia.o...
Kamal Jain, former candidate for State Auditor http://kamaljain.com/...
Jordan Page, liberty songwriter-musician http://www.jordanpage...
Dave Kopacz - Vice President MassLPA - intro of Bill Gunn http://www.masslpa.or...
Bill Gunn, candidate for Congress, Dist. 1 http://www.billgunnfo...
Gerry Dembrowski, candidate for Congress, Dist. 7 http://www.gerry2010....
Earl Sholley, former candidate for Congress, Dist. 4 http://sholleyforcong...
Sean Ryan, candidate - Boston City Council, Dist. 6 special election www.seanryanforcitycouncil.com/
Rich Howell – organizer for Western Mass. Tea Party http://www.teapartypa...
Yan Ben Che – Dartmouth MA high school class valedictorian of 2009
Dr. Mildred Jefferson – American Patriot and Stateswoman http://en.wikipedia.o...
Christen Varley, organizer of Greater Boston Tea Party http://greaterbostont...
Brad Wyatt, state coordinator-Campaign For Liberty, intro of Lew Evangelidis http://www.campaignfo...
State Rep. Lew Evangelidis, candidate for Worcester County Sheriff www.lewforsheriff.com
Taking of the Oath, led by local reps of OathKeepers
Pete Hammond, Ron Villareale, and Wayne Cormier http://oathkeepers.or...
Benediction - Patriot Pastor Garrett Lear http://www.thepatriot...

Event Committee Contacts:
Dan McGonigle
Bob Dwyer
Tom Moor
item.name: Constitution Day Celebration
